sections.heading: 01|Manner of paying officials - general county fund
sections.text: Effective:December 6, 1976Latest Legislation:House Bill 784 - 111th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFEach county auditor, county treasurer, clerk of the court of common pleas, sheriff, county recorder, county commissioner, prosecuting

sections.heading: 13,325.16,325.17,325.20, and325
sections.text: 27to325.32of the Revised Code shall not make a county, or an officer thereof, liable to any of the officers named in such sections, or his deputies, assistants, clerks, bookkeepers, or other employees, for the payment of compensation in excess of the amount authorized
